TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SPUrlExpressionEditor extends System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditor
Public NotInheritable Class SPUrlExpressionEditor Inherits ExpressionEditor
public ref class SPUrlExpressionEditor sealed : System::Web::UI::Design::ExpressionEditor

Docs.summary: Defines a set of properties and methods for evaluating an expression that contains ~site, ~site and/or ~language that is associated with a control property at design time.

remarks.para: This class also provides an expression editor sheet to the visual design host,SharePoint Designer, for use in the expression editor dialog box.

override this.EvaluateExpression : string * obj * Type * IServiceProvider -> obj

Docs.param: An expression string to evaluate. The expression does not include the expression prefix.
This parameter is not currently in use.
A string to evaluate that identifies the type of property.
This parameter is not currently in use.
Docs.summary: Evaluates an expression string and provides the design-time value for a control property.
Docs.returns: A object that represents the expression string that was evaluated, if the expression evaluation succeeded; otherwise, a null reference.
